dw:transform-message.doc:name: WorkerType To Map
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %input payload application/java %output application/java --- { FirstName: payload.workerData.personalData.nameData.legalNameData.nameDetailData.firstName, LastName: payload.workerData.personalData.nameData.legalNameData.nameDetailData.lastName, Email: payload.workerData.personalData.contactData.emailAddressData[0].emailAddress when (payload.workerData.personalData.contactData.emailAddressData != null) otherwise null, UserName: payload.workerData.userAccountData.userName when (payload.workerData.userAccountData != null) otherwise null, TimeZoneSidKey: "America/New_York", LanguageLocaleKey: payload.workerData.userAccountData.defaultDisplayLanguageReference.ID[1].value when (payload.workerData.userAccountData != null and payload.workerData.userAccountData.defaultDisplayLanguageReference != null) otherwise null, LocaleSidKey: payload.workerData.userAccountData.localeReference.ID[1].value when (payload.workerData.userAccountData != null and payload.workerData.userAccountData.localeReference != null) otherwise null, Alias: payload.workerData.userAccountData.userName when (payload.workerData.userAccountData != null) otherwise null }
